sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Item } from 'semantic-ui-react'

const User = ({ id, username, image }) => {
    console.log(image)

    return (
        <Item className="mb-4">
            <Item.Image size='tiny' src={require(`../../Profiles/media/profile_pictures/large/${image}`)} />
            <Item.Content>
                <Item.Header>{username}</Item.Header>
            </Item.Content>
        </Item>
    )
}

export default User
